jeydotc_notify.name: Notify
jeydotc_notify.description: Notify to matching instances that something happened.

on-notified.description: Happens when this instance is notified of the specified event.

event.name: Event
event.desc: The name of the notified event, can be any string.

on-instance-variable-changed.description: Triggered when the given instance variable gets changed, this only happens if you previously started to observe the variable with the 'Observe' action.

on-boolean-instance-variable-changed.description: Triggered when the given boolean instance variable gets changed, this only happens if you previously started to observe the variable with the 'Observe' action.

notify.description: Notifies of the occurrence of the given event.

event.name: Event
event.desc: The name of the event to be notified, can be any string.

debounce-for.description: Ignore all notifications of a given event for a given amount of time.

event.name: Event
event.desc: The name of the event to be ignored, can be any string.

seconds.name: Seconds
seconds.desc: The time in seconds the event will be ignored.

frequency.name: Frequency In Seconds
frequency.desc: How often should we check for changes, default 0 for every tick.

ignore-deferred.name: Ignore Deferred Changes
ignore-deferred.desc: Ignore any change that happens before the next notification cycle.

observe-boolean.description: Observes the given boolean instance variable.

variable.name: Instance Variable
variable.desc: The boolean instance variable to observe.

frequency.name: Frequency In Seconds
frequency.desc: How often should we check for changes, default 0 for every tick.

ignore-deferred.name: Ignore Deferred Changes
ignore-deferred.desc: Ignore any change that happens before the next notification cycle.

stop-observing.description: Stops observing the given instance variable.

variable.name: Instance Variable
variable.desc: The instance variable to stop observing.
